events.text: [color=#ffed29]("For the future, we would advise that you go through the MMA and not the church for any medicinal or magical product that is not divine.")
[color=#ffed29]([b]Remedium[/b] was going to be approved through the church???)
[color=#ffed29](How does that make any sense at all???)

[color=#ffed29](That is so strange. I assumed it was...)
[color=#ffed29](I dunno, funding or something that the church was providing. )
[color=#ffed29](The Jones brothers are a much better fit for [b]Remedium[/b], I'm glad they're on board.)
